about_the_game:
Darkness Edition

  • Support the devs by purchasing this DLC and unlock the special edition Darkness skins!

Gameplay

Switch between 3 unique elements:
  • Energy - auto targets enemies and can be upgraded to synergize with the other elements.
  • Fire - applies burn which damage over time and an area of effect.
  • Ice - applies freeze which slows enemy movement and attack speed.
Use powerful abilities:
  • Slow Time - improve reaction time and graze between enemy projectiles.
  • Teleport - dash out of impossible situations.
  • Bullet Clear - life saving ultimate that destroys all enemy projectiles.

Features

  • Roguelite bullet hell.
  • Arcade style competitive scoring.
  • Global, friends, and personal leaderboards.
  • Randomly generated maps in every play through.
  • Procedurally generated bosses and attack patterns.
  • 100+ different upgrades to craft your own play style.
  • Variety of UI and player cosmetics.
  • 20+ unlockable perks.

Darkness Edition

  • Support the devs by purchasing this DLC and unlock the special edition Darkness skins!

Gameplay

Switch between 3 unique elements:

  • Bullet Clear - life saving ultimate that destroys all enemy projectiles.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Mojave
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Mojave
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560X
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Element X (Darkness Edition)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7820X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Element X is a hardcore roguelite bullet hell, challenge rutheless enemies and claim your high score!
